issues.message: All class literals must be written before any attribute blocks
issues.sourceListing:
mixin TasksFilteringPanel

  .TasksFilteringPanel&attributes(attributes)

    .TasksFilteringPanel-Title 自動生成群

    ul.TasksFilteringPanel-List

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        //- 【 CSSクラステスト 】 .TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button__SelectedState
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button").TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button__SelectedState
          +Checklist--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 全課題
      
      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button")
          +Calendar--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 日付連想

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button")
          +Calendar__Time--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 日時連想

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button")
          +Location__BottomCircle--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 場所

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button")
          +Calendar__Repeat--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 定期

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button")
          +Folder__Stationery--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 計画

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button")
          +Calendar__Date--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 本日

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(type="button")
          +Person__Clock__Rectangled__Filled--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label 他人に依存


    .TasksFilteringPanel-Title カスタム整理

    ul.TasksFilteringPanel-List

      li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item

        button.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-CollapsingToggle(
          type="button"
          aria-label="Collapse"
        ): +Triangle__Upward__Circled__Filled--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-CollapsingToggle-Icon

        a.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(href="#")
          +Folder__Filled--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
          span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label カスタム群1

        ul.TasksFilteringPanel-List

          li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
            a.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(href="#")
              +Folder__Filled--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
              span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label カスタム群1-1

          li.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item
            a.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Button(href="#")
              +Folder__Filled--YDF_Icon.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Icon
              span.TasksFilteringPanel-List-Item-Label カスタム群1-2
